name: Bomb City
description:
Bomb City used to be a happy place, until a sinister purple cloud loomed over it, and started shooting lightning. What could be the cause of this? The owner of Bomb City, King Boom, has a hunch. His rival, King Missile, could be the reason, and this might be his first step to taking over the city! Now you, King Boom, and his allies must make your way to Missile's hideout, and put an end to his plans once and for all! Can you stop this villain, or will Bomb City be doomed?

  • 15 Level Campaign Mode - Make your way through 15 levels and battle different enemies, each with their own twist! Face difficult bosses and overcome level events! While adventuring, you'll come across different mini games. Complete these to move onward! Unlock Survival mode and survive as long as possible!
  • Many Bombs to Meet - Across your adventure, you will meet 4 different bomb friends that will be happy to help you on your journey, 4 different cards to help you during battle, 6 different enemies, each with their own quirks, and 3 different tough bosses!
  • Online Functionality - Go online to chat and play against other users! Create a lobby and battle your friends and strangers!
  • Bomb City Arcade - Collect daily tokens and play fun arcade games, such as Space Haste, where you shoot aliens to rack up points, or Blast-a-thon, where you try to defeat as many enemies as possible before time runs out!
  • DLC Costumes - Customize your favorite bombs with costume DLC packs!
  • Achievements - Try and unlock a bunch of achievements! Try to raise your achievement rank to max!

Bomb City is sure to be an explosive experience (Oh man, that pun was bad, I'm sorry) that you'll never forget!

You can download the public demo down below if you'd like to see how the game is coming along! I'd love to hear feedback! (NOTE: The Demo version does not save properly. Data will be lost upon closing the game.)
